     56 struct match_stats {
     57     timeval re2_time;
     58     timeval git_time;
     59     timeval sort_time;
     60     timeval index_time;
     61     timeval analyze_time;
     62     int matches;
     63     exit_reason why;
     64 
     65     match_stats() : re2_time((struct timeval){0}),
     66         git_time((struct timeval){0}),
     67         sort_time((struct timeval){0}),
     68         index_time((struct timeval){0}),
     69         analyze_time((struct timeval){0}),
     70         matches(0),
     71         why(kExitNone) {}
     72 };

     95 struct match_result {
     96     indexed_file *file;
     97     int lno;
     98     vector<StringPiece> context_before;
     99     vector<StringPiece> context_after;
    100     StringPiece line;
    101     int matchleft, matchright;
    102 };
    103 
    104 struct file_result {
    105     indexed_file *file;
    106     int matchleft, matchright;
    107 };

    109 // A query specification passed to match(). line_pat is required to be
    110 // non-NULL; file_pat, tree_pat and tag_pat may be NULL to specify "no
    111 // constraint"
    112 struct query {
    113     std::string trace_id;
    114     int32_t max_matches;
    115 
    116     std::shared_ptr<RE2> line_pat;
    117     std::shared_ptr<RE2> file_pat;
    118     std::shared_ptr<RE2> tree_pat;
    119     std::shared_ptr<RE2> tags_pat;
    120     struct {
    121         std::shared_ptr<RE2> file_pat;
    122         std::shared_ptr<RE2> tree_pat;
    123         std::shared_ptr<RE2> tags_pat;
    124     } negate;
    125 
    126     bool filename_only;
    127     int context_lines;
    128 };

    130 class code_searcher {
    131 public:
    132     code_searcher();
    133     ~code_searcher();
    134     void dump_index(const string& path);
    135     void load_index(const string& path);
    136 
    137     const indexed_tree *open_tree(const string &name, const Metadata &meta, const string& version);
    138     const indexed_tree *open_tree(const string &name, const string& version);
    139 
    140     void index_file(const indexed_tree *tree,
    141                     const string& path,
    142                     StringPiece contents);
    143     void finalize();
    144 
    145     void set_alloc(std::unique_ptr<chunk_allocator> alloc);
    146     chunk_allocator *alloc() { return alloc_.get(); }
    147 
    148     vector<indexed_tree> trees() const;
    149     string name() const {
    150         return name_;
    151     };
    152     void set_name(const string& name) {
    153         name_ = name;
    154     }
    155 
    156     vector<std::unique_ptr<indexed_file>>::const_iterator begin_files() {
    157         return files_.begin();
    158     }
    159     vector<std::unique_ptr<indexed_file>>::const_iterator end_files() {
    160         return files_.end();
    161     }
    162 
    163     int64_t index_timestamp() {
    164         return index_timestamp_;
    165     }
    166 
    167     class search_thread {
    168     public:
    169         search_thread(code_searcher *cs);
    170         ~search_thread();
    171 
    172         // function that will be called to record a match
    173         typedef std::function<void (const struct match_result*)> callback_func;
    174         // function that will be called to record a filename match
    175         typedef std::function<void (const struct file_result*)> file_callback_func;
    176         // function that will be called to transform a match
    177         typedef std::function<bool (struct match_result*)> transform_func;
    178 
    179         /* file_pat may be NULL */
    180         void match(const query& q,
    181                    const callback_func& cb,
    182                    const file_callback_func& fcb,
    183                    match_stats *stats)
    184         {
    185             match(q, cb, fcb, transform_func(), stats);
    186         }
    187         void match(const query& q,
    188                    const callback_func& cb,
    189                    const file_callback_func& fcb,
    190                    const transform_func& func,
    191                    match_stats *stats);
    192     protected:
    193         struct job {
    194             std::string trace_id;
    195             atomic_int pending;
    196             searcher *search;
    197             filename_searcher *file_search;
    198             thread_queue<chunk*> chunks;
    199         };
    200 
    201         const code_searcher *cs_;
    202         vector<std::thread> threads_;
    203         thread_queue<job*> queue_;
    204         thread_queue<job*> file_queue_;
    205 
    206         static void search_one(search_thread *);
    207         static void search_file_one(search_thread *);
    208     private:
    209         search_thread(const search_thread&);
    210         void operator=(const search_thread&);
    211     };
    212 
    213 protected:
    214     string name_;
    215 
    216     // Transient structure used during index construction to dedup lines.
    217     // Looking up a StringPiece here will find an equivalent StringPiece
    218     // already stored in some existing chunk's data, if such a StringPiece is
    219     // present.
    220     absl::flat_hash_set<StringPiece, hashstr> lines_;
    221 
    222     std::unique_ptr<chunk_allocator> alloc_;
    223 
    224     // Indicates that everything all is ready for searching--we are done creating
    225     // index or initializing it from a file.
    226     bool finalized_;
    227 
    228     // Timestamp representing the end of index construction.
    229     int64_t index_timestamp_;
    230 
    231     // Structures for fast filename search; somewhat similar to a single chunk.
    232     // Built from files_ at finalization, not serialized or anything like that.
    233     vector<unsigned char> filename_data_;
    234     vector<uint32_t> filename_suffixes_;
    235     // pairs (i, file), where file->path starts at filename_data_[i]
    236     vector<pair<int, indexed_file*>> filename_positions_;
    237 
    238     vector<std::unique_ptr<indexed_tree>> trees_;
    239     vector<std::unique_ptr<indexed_file>> files_;
    240 
    241 private:
    242     void index_filenames();
    243 
    244     friend class search_thread;
    245     friend class searcher;
    246     friend class filename_searcher;
    247     friend class codesearch_index;
    248     friend class load_allocator;
    249     friend class tag_searcher;
    250 };
